7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.name: Bleeding Corners Fix
7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.description: Fixes the white outlines (or artifacts) on the rounded corners that can appear on some pages. May cause higher GPU usage on some devices.
7d577b21-4685-4db2-bb17-d39d08eec199.author: rsiebertdev
